text: Channel 4 is a television channel that broadcasts to the United Kingdom. It started on 2 November 1982. On 10 December 2010, Channel 4 started a HD version of their channel on Sky. ==Programmes== ==Notes== ==References== Category:1982 establishments in the United Kingdom Category:British television channels Category:Channel 4 The Snowman and The Snowdog Peppa Pig closed 3rd October 2021 on E4
title: Channel 4
